line_1: " Love shall his votary with new strength endue. "
line_2: "Yon fatal summit distant still I view."

line_1: Why does one Climate, and one Soil endue
line_2: The blushing Poppy with a crimson Hue;

line_1: Why does one Climate, and one Soil endue
line_2: Yet leave the Lilly pale, and tinge the Violet blue?
